fields.Title of Contribution: <span style="color:#222222;font-size:small;">GenAI as the New Peer: Pre-service Teachers’ Perspectives of Leveraging GenAI for Critical Feedback</span>
fields.Name of Conference: Society for Information Technology and Teacher Education International Conference (SITE) 2025
fields.Publisher: Society for Information Technology & Teacher Education
fields.Description/Abstract: <p><span style="font-weight:400;">This study investigates pre-service teachers' perceptions and experiences using Generative AI tools for critical feedback on assignments. By engaging with AI for evaluation and feedback, participants are expected to enhance their ability to assess and reflect on AI-generated insights, fostering critical thinking and self-assessment skills. The findings offer practical implications for how AI can be effectively integrated into educational contexts to enhance both academic success and professional development for future educators.</span></p>
